_comment: Ollama Web UI Egg via GitHub
name: Ollama Web UI
author: dwwarren1@cougars.ccis.edu
description: Runs Ollama with a FastAPI web UI. Auto-installs dependencies and pulls default model.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt-get update -y && apt-get install -y curl git python3 python3-pip ca-certificates

# Clone your repo
git clone https://github.com/N0tMilk/ollama-pterodactyl.git /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

# Install Python dependencies including FastAPI & Uvicorn
pip3 install --break-system-packages --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt uvicorn fastapi

# Install Ollama
curl -fsSL https://ollama.com/install.sh | sh

# Make startup script executable
chmod +x /mnt/server/startup.sh
echo "Installation complete."
